data.text:
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I can't wait to see this!! 
Just reflecting a bit...#MissionImpossible was one of my fav TV shows when I was a kid. The whole fam watched it together. I'm glad Peter Graves lived long enough to see it explode on film. What a legacy...
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise  https://t.co/83ZveG1rnf
@NextBestPicture Yes, we know, he is a space alien. 😂👽😜
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I love his dramatic moment. Guy still make you feel his pain. Would love to see him do an indie or drama and get an Oscar already!
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise Agreed
@TryingToBeDJV @NextBestPicture @justiceleaguewb Bond, shit. I need him to be Napoleon Solo again!
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I’m doing a double feature of Blindspotting and Sorry to Bother You that day, but I just want the Blu Ray for Fallout to be available already. I’d have that on repeat.
@NextBestPicture @chrismcquarrie Agree those scenes with Rebecca & Michelle are great.
@MetalDave815 @TomCruise Going again Saturday for sure!!
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise The last 20 minutes. I had like 50 heart attacks. I plan on seeing this movie at least 2 more times in theaters.
Oh and another thing...thank you @chrismcquarrie for giving Ving Rhames more to do and making him more than just “that guy who’s always with Ethan in these movies” to people.
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I agree, it’s really good and fun! It is a touch too long in the middle, but one of the series’ best.
@NextBestPicture Seeing this next week and I can’t wait (doesn’t come out in Aus until then)
@marwa_abdllah @TomCruise Can confirm...my heart rate was up during that final sequence https://t.co/NGKepK8Qbc

The term “action junkie” definitely applies to me right now.

I’m high af on cinema right now and I just want more more more!!! #MissionImpossibleFallout
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I’ve seen all of Tom Cruise’s MI. I love them and for me, each one gets better and better. He’s my American “Bond” https://t.co/nWx0qXGUQv
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise It's like doing a cardio while just sitting in your chair. 😂😂
@NextBestPicture @justiceleaguewb The. Man. Should. Be. Bond. I’ll. Keep. Saying. It. Till. It. Happens.
They sacrificed @justiceleaguewb for this....totally worth it https://t.co/fyTbMow158
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise I Know it’s good if you tweeted that!!!! I can’t wait to see it Saturday!!!! https://t.co/Wo8pwmliie
@kerkinasti @TomCruise @chrismcquarrie Sound categories

@kerkinasti @TomCruise It’s still very much a Mission: Impossible movie but the scale is bigger, the stakes are greater, the music is better, the tension is better, the writing is better, the sound, visuals, editing. Everything. @chrismcquarrie directed the hell out of this & really outdid himself
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise Along with Hugh Jackman, Cruise needs to find that role to give him that Oscar. Long deserved from both. They're great at anything.  So versatile.
@NextBestPicture @TomCruise This pleases me, got my ticket for Saturday. I'm so excited I love these movies.
